thread.title: A Deadly Snake Slithering This Close To An Oblivious Little Girl Is Every Adult's Nightmare
thread.title_full: A Deadly Snake Slithering This Close To An Oblivious Little Girl Is Every Adult's Nightmare - BuzzFeed News

author: Anna Mendoza
title: A Deadly Snake Slithering This Close To An Oblivious Little Girl Is Every Adult's Nightmare
text:
View this image › 
Bianca Dickinson / Caters News ID: 10804704 2. Dickinson told the ABC the incident happened at their home in Kaniva, western Victoria. View this image › 
Bianca Dickinson/Caters News “I was looking through my camera lens [when] I saw something move in the corner of my eye and actually thought it was bark coming off the tree.”
ID: 10804709 3. STAY STILL, LITTLE MOLLY! View this image › 
Bianca Dickinson / Caters News / BuzzFeed ID: 10804701 4. No big deal, but the eastern brown is responsible for more deaths in Australia than any other snake. ID: 10804976 5. Thankfully, no one was hurt. The snake continued on its own snakey journey and Molly had no idea about the close encounter. View this image › 
Bianca Dickinson / Caters News “Maybe in years to come she’ll have a look at it and see how lucky she was to escape,” mum said.
ID: 10804714 Check out more articles on BuzzFeed.com! 
Anna Mendoza is a photo editor for BuzzFeed and is based in Sydney, Australia. Contact Anna Mendoza at Anna.Mendoza@buzzfeed.com . Got a confidential tip? Submit it here .
